title: Toshiya Ishii
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Ishii was born in <a href="Fujieda%2C%20Shizuoka">Fujieda</a> on January 19, 1978. After graduating from <a href="Shizuoka%20Gakuen%20High%20School">Shizuoka Gakuen High School</a>, he joined <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club <a href="Urawa%20Reds">Urawa Reds</a> in 1996. He became a regular player as defensive midfielder in 1998. Although he played many matches for a long time, his opportunity to play decreased in 2002. In 2003, he moved to <a href="Vegalta%20Sendai">Vegalta Sendai</a>. Although he played as regular player in 2003, his opportunity to play decreased in 2004. In 2005, he moved to <a href="Kyoto%20Sanga%20FC">Kyoto Purple Sanga</a> (later "Kyoto Sanga FC"). Although he could not play many matches until early 2006, he became a regular player from late 2006. However the club gains many players in 2008 and he could hardly play in the match behind new member <a href="Yuto%20Sato">Yuto Sato</a> and <a href="Sidiclei%20de%20Souza">Sidiclei</a>. In 2009, he moved to <a href="Roasso%20Kumamoto">Roasso Kumamoto</a>. Although he played as regular player, he was released for generational change end of 2009 season. In 2010, he moved to his local club <a href="Fujieda%20MYFC">Fujieda MYFC</a> in <a href="Japanese%20Regional%20Leagues">Regional Leagues</a>. He played as regular player and the club was promoted to <a href="Japan%20Football%20League">Japan Football League</a> from 2012. He retired end of 2013 season.
